javadoc: PasswordDialog is a modal dialog which prompts a user for a password.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: title
params.comment: title of the dialog

params.name: serverType
params.comment: 'Server' or 'Key-store' designation

params.name: serverName
params.comment: name of server or keystore pathname

params.name: passPrompt
params.comment:
password prompt to show in the dialog; may be null, in which case
 "Password:" is displayed next to the password field

params.name: namePrompt
params.comment: name prompt to show in the dialog, if null a name will not be prompted for.

params.name: defaultUserID
params.comment: default name when prompting for a name

params.name: choicePrompt
params.comment: namePrompt name prompt to show in the dialog, if null a name will not be prompted for.

params.name: choices
params.comment: array of choices to present if choicePrompt is not null

params.name: defaultChoice
params.comment: default choice index

methods.name: <init>

params.comment: title of the dialog

params.comment: 'Server' or 'Key-store' designation

params.name: serverName
params.comment: name of server or keystore pathname

methods.name: <init>

params.name: title
params.comment: title of the dialog

params.name: serverType
params.comment: 'Server' or 'Key-store' designation

params.name: serverName
params.comment: name of server or keystore pathname

params.name: passPrompt
params.comment:
password prompt to show in the dialog; may be null, in which case
 "Password:" is displayed next to the password field

params.name: namePrompt
params.comment: name prompt to show in the dialog, if null a name will not be prompted for.

params.name: defaultUserID
params.comment: default name when prompting for a name

params.name: hasMessages
params.comment:
true if the client will set messages on this dialog.  If true, the 
        dialog's minimum size will be increased

methods.javadoc: Return the password entered in the password field.
methods.name: getPassword
methods.comment: Return the password entered in the password field.

methods.javadoc: Return the user ID entered in the password field
methods.name: getUserID
methods.comment: Return the user ID entered in the password field

methods.javadoc: Returns index of selected choice or -1 if no choice has been made
methods.name: getChoice
methods.comment: Returns index of selected choice or -1 if no choice has been made

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the OK button was pressed.
methods.name: okWasPressed
methods.comment: Returns true if the OK button was pressed.

name: PasswordDialog
comment:
PasswordDialog is a modal dialog which 
 prompts a user for a password.
